2025-04-28.title: Q2 Metals Extends Mineralized Zone Strike Length to 1.5 Kilometres and Concludes the 2025 Winter Program at the Cisco Lithium Project in Quebec, Canada
2025-04-28.description: Highlights: The 2025 Winter Program concluded with 6,997 metres (m) drilled across 14 holes. Drill hole CS25-028 encountered eight (8) spodumene pegmatite intervals, with the widest interval of 50.9 m of continuous spodumene pegmatite, along with additional n…
